entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -3.7°C
